txt.en: 'I do not know where they have all gone, but thank you for saving me.'
'Thank you! Our captors left us with these ruffians.'
'They left me here to die. Thank you. Thank you!'
'They left us. I do not know where they have gone.'
'They were setting sail. Captain Yarikh and his crew said something about the Nenglor.'
'They saw you arrive. They are going to your ship!'
'I draw the line here, no further. You will trouble me no more, Captain.'
'As you command. I will see you on the northern shores.'
'You hunt me across years, the seas, and for what a few worthless lives we cut short? You seek vengeance?'
'You act like a mad dog. I know how to deal with mad dogs. Akh√¢t, crush the life from them.'
